name: Tales of Candelum: Revenge in Blades
name_original: Tales of Candelum: Revenge in Blades
description:
Set thousands of years before The Last Light, play as Sayiff and hunt down the Jade Fists' leader, Ol' Ruby, to bring justice to Candelum's Edge.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Attack
  • Shift (Hold) - Upwards Burst
  • P - Swap Character
  • F5 - Open Music-swap menu

Explore a brand new location: the Jade Peaks, located in the high mountain ranges of Candelum's Edge. Fight your way through snowy wastelands, ransacked villages, and villainous mansions. Collect all 8 Jade Boxes to get a... strange reward.

Features 10 different playable characters, many brought here across time and space, can you unlock them all?
